title: Barns Ave,Mt Lavinia 3 Br Brand New Apartments
details:
3 Bedroom , 2 Bathroom brand new apartments available for sale.

Please note that this a project constructed by Blue Ocean Group and it has been structurally fully completed reaching the finishing stage ,the last few Units are available for sale where as we are looking forward to complete the project in a matter of months where as interest free payment plans and Bank Loans could be arranged If required.

Feel free enough to contact me anytime for further details and arrangements could be made to view a model apartment and the site.

Whatsapp / Viber - 0777 121 926
